patthana7.22:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
patthana7.22:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
patthana7.22:1.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana7.22:1.1_3: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana7.22:1.1_4: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana7.22:1.1_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana7.22:1.1_6: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca
patthana7.22:2.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:2.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
patthana7.22:2.1_2: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
patthana7.22:2.1_3: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana7.22:2.1_4: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana7.22:2.1_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana7.22:2.1_6: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana7.22:3.1_0: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:3.1_1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:3.1_2: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
patthana7.22:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
patthana7.22:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana7.22:6.1: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
patthana7.22:7.1: (Yathā kusalattike sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
